body_text: Yeah, in retrospect we don't need the componentWillReceiveProps at all - the cache is keyed on column slug, so if the options update, the cache is still relevant.
body: Yeah, in retrospect we don't need the `componentWillReceiveProps` at all - the cache is keyed on column slug, so if the options update, the cache is still relevant.
body_html: Yeah, in retrospect we don't need the componentWillReceiveProps at all - the cache is keyed on column slug, so if the options update, the cache is still relevant.
